column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////After having been to Mercat a la planxa and avec
column2: I wasn't impressed with Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba.  We ordered the fried calamari and bacon wrapped dates.  Both dishes were drenched in oil which left me cringing.  The sangria seemed too watery as well.  Moreover
column3: the atmosphere of the place is rather dark and dull. If you want a date that doesn't impose much burden on your wallet
column4: then this may be your spot.  On a personal level
column5: I would much rather visit Mercat for a true tapas experience.  HOWEVER
column6: if I were to give one praise
column7: then it'd be the restrooms.  They are clean and well managed!
